code: import{applyMiddleware,combineReducers,createStore}from"redux";import thunkMiddleWare from"redux-thunk";import{reducer as formReducer}from"redux-form";import userReducers from"../redux/users-reducer";var reducers=combineReducers({form:formReducer,users:userReducers});var store=createStore(reducers,applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleWare));window.store=store;export default store;
